title: James Hetfield did NOT like Enter Sandman at first
transcription: I didn't think Anderson Man was such a great song. I think Lars and Bob Rock said, go back, I challenge you to go back and work on it. And I did, and that line that Kat's phrased, you know, we're off to never, never land. What happens in your sleep, you know, why do we have these certain nightmares? And a lot of people could identify with that. Everyone has nightmares, and what do you do with them? And why do they show up? Which part of that is the hello? So, yeah.
